title: 4 Bedroom House for Sale in Ethul Kotte
details:
REF NO: HFS0104

Architectural designed 4 Bedroom House for Sale in Ethul Kotte

- Furnished
- Built in 2013
- 3 storeyed
- 7.14 perches
- 3000 sqft
- 4 Bedrooms (Air conditioned)
- 3 Attached bathrooms with 1 common bathroom
- Living and Dinning area with an open space concept
- Kitchen with Pantry
- TV lounge
- 3 phase electricity
- Hot water
- Storage room
- Large roof top terrace

Located in a quiet residential area surrounded by a decent neighborhood and is roughly 300 meters from the Kotte main road. This location is very convenient to all major super markets, banks, restaurants, bus stand, post office and schools. It is only 15 mins drive to the Colombo city center.

Price of the property - 52 Million
Price is exclusive of legal fee and stamp duty fee


Inspections with prior appointments
